official_title: To suspend through December 31, 1994, the duty on ioxilan.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on 1,3-benzenedicarboxamide, 5-(acetyl(2,3-dihydroxypropyl) aminol-N-(2,3-dihydroxypropyl)-N'- (2-hydroxyethyl)-2,4,6-triiodo (also known as ioxilan).

titles.title: To suspend through December 31, 1994, the duty on ioxilan.
